mdRecord.dcterms:title: Mount Vernon Mansion, east front
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Leet Bros.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white horizontal image of the Mansion's east front with balustrade, taken from the southeast lawn. The south porch is also visible. Handwriting on the reverse reads: 'Received in library Feb 25, 1960. from Leonard F. Ball 1st Lt. A.g.c. Assistant currator USAAMC Museum Washington area. Letter accompanying g.v. states the photograph is from the papers of Genl John Glenman.'
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mansion exterior
